person.persName: Nathaniel L. Lightfoot (Hancock County farmer and doctor)

body.p: Kentucky farmer and doctor. Lived in Hancock County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Ema P Lightfoot. Father of E. W. Lightfoot, Annie W Lightfoot, and Alma Lightfoot. Served as a Breckinridge County member of the Kentucky House of Representatives in 1847. Member of the Hancock County Home Guard in 1862.
